org.alienideology.jcord.handle.managers

Interface IGuildManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuildManager

    public interface IGuildManager
    IGuildManager - The manager that manages and perform actions upon a guild.
    Since:
    0.0.4
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentity

        default Identity getIdentity()
        Get the identity the guild belongs to.
        Returns:
        The identity.

      • getGuild

        IGuild getGuild()
        Get the guild this managers manages.
        Returns:
        The guild.

      • modifyName

        void modifyName(java.lang.String name)
        Modify the guild's name. Null or empty name will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        name - The string name.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyOwner

        void modifyOwner(IMember newOwner)
        Modify the guild's owner. The identity must be the guild owner originally in order to modify the owner. This is human only, since bots can not be a guild owner.
        Parameters:
        newOwner - The new owner.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyRegion

        void modifyRegion(Region region)
        Modify the guild's region. Region.UNKNOWN will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        region - The region enumeration.
        Throws:
        HttpErrorException - if the region is vip, but the guild is not. See Region.isVIP
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyVerification

        void modifyVerification(IGuild.Verification verification)
        Modify the guild's verification level. IGuild.Verification.UNKNOWN will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        verification - The verification enumeration.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyNotification

        void modifyNotification(IGuild.Notification notification)
        Modify the guild's notification level. IGuild.Notification.UNKNOWN will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        notification - The notification enumeration.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyAFKTimeout

        void modifyAFKTimeout(IGuild.AFKTimeout afkTimeout)
        Modify the guild's afk timeout. IGuild.AFKTimeout.UNKNOWN will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        afkTimeout - The afk timeout.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyAFKChannel

        void modifyAFKChannel(IVoiceChannel afkChannel)
        Modify the guild's afk channel. Null channel will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        afkChannel - The afk channel.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyAFKChannel

        void modifyAFKChannel(java.lang.String afkChannelId)
        Modify the guild's afk channel by ID. Null or empty ID will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        afkChannelId - The afk channel ID.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.

      • modifyIcon

        void modifyIcon(Icon icon)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Modify the guild's icon.
        Parameters:
        icon - The image file.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.
        java.io.IOException - When decoding image.

      • modifySplash

        void modifySplash(Icon icon)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Modify the guild's splash icon. This is VIP guild only.
        Parameters:
        icon - The image.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Manager Server or Administrator permission.
        java.io.IOException - When decoding image.

      • kickMember

        boolean kickMember(IMember member)
        Kick a member. To let the identity leave a guild, see ISelfManager.leaveGuild(IGuild)
        Parameters:
        member - The member.
        Returns:
        True if the member is kicked successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Kick Members permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the identity tries to kick itself from the guild. Please use {leave()} to leave a guild.

      • kickMember

        boolean kickMember(java.lang.String memberId)
        Kick a member by ID. To let the identity leave a guild, see ISelfManager.leaveGuild(IGuild)
        Parameters:
        memberId - The member's ID.
        Returns:
        True if the member is kicked successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Kick Members permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is at a higher hierarchy than the identity (ie.e server owner)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the identity tries to kick itself from the guild. Please use {leave()} to leave a guild.

      • getPrunableCount

        int getPrunableCount()
        Get the value of members than can be pruned. The default days of this event is 7.
        Returns:
        The integer value of prunable members.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Kick Members Administrator permissions.
        See Also:
        For more information on pruning members.

      • getPrunableCount

        int getPrunableCount(int days)
        Get the value of members than can by pruned.
        Parameters:
        days - The amount of days to start pruning.
        Returns:
        The integer value of prunable members.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Kick Members Administrator permissions.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the days provided are smaller than 1 or greater than 30.
        See Also:
        For more information on pruning members.

      • pruneMembers

        void pruneMembers()
        Prune members that are not active for a certain days.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Kick Members Administrator permissions. The default days of this event is 7.
        See Also:
        For more information on pruning members.

      • pruneMembers

        void pruneMembers(int days)
        Prune members that are not active for the given days. Prune:

        Pruning will kick members than has not been seen in an amount of days and are not assigned to any roles. The kicked members can rejoin the guild using a new instant invite.

        Parameters:
        days - The amount of days.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Kick Members Administrator permissions.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the days provided are smaller than 1 or greater than 30.

      • getBans

        java.util.List<IMember> getBans()
        Get a list of members that are banned from this guild.
        Returns:
        A list of banned members.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Ban Members permission.

      • banMember

        boolean banMember(IMember member)
        Ban a member. The number of days to delete messages is 7 by default.
        Parameters:
        member - The member.
        Returns:
        True if the member is banned successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Ban Member or Administrator permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is at a higher hierarchy than the identity (ie.e server owner)
        ErrorResponseException - If the member does not belong to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_MEMBER

      • banMember

        boolean banMember(IMember member,
                  int days)
        Ban a member.
        Parameters:
        member - The member.
        days - The number of days to delete the member's message. Only valid between 0 and 7.
        Returns:
        True if the member is banned successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Ban Member or Administrator permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is at a higher hierarchy than the identity (ie.e server owner)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the days are smaller than 0 or greater than 7.
        ErrorResponseException - If the member does not belong to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_MEMBER

      • banMember

        boolean banMember(java.lang.String memberId)
        Ban a member by ID. The number of days to delete messages is 7 by default.
        Parameters:
        memberId - The member's ID.
        Returns:
        True if the member is banned successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Ban Member or Administrator permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is at a higher hierarchy than the identity (ie.e server owner)
        ErrorResponseException - If the member does not belong to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_MEMBER

      • banMember

        boolean banMember(java.lang.String memberId,
                  int days)
        Ban a member by ID.
        Parameters:
        memberId - The member's ID.
        days - The number of days to delete the member's message. Only valid between 0 and 7.
        Returns:
        True if the member is banned successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Ban Member or Administrator permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is at a higher hierarchy than the identity (ie.e server owner)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the days are smaller than 0 or greater than 7.
        ErrorResponseException - If the member does not belong to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_MEMBER

      • unbanUser

        boolean unbanUser(IUser user)
        Unban a user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user.
        Returns:
        True if the member is unbanned successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Ban Member or Administrator permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If the user is not in the guild ban list.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_USER

      • unbanUser

        boolean unbanUser(java.lang.String memberId)
        Unban a member by ID.
        Parameters:
        memberId - The user's ID.
        Returns:
        True if the user is unbanned successfully.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Ban Member or Administrator permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If the user is not in the guild ban list.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_USER

      • createTextChannel

        ITextChannel createTextChannel(ITextChannel channel)
        Create a text channel in this guild.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel built by ChannelBuilder.
        Returns:
        The text channel created. This returning channel is not the same instance as the parameter.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Channels permission.
        See Also:
        ChannelBuilder.buildTextChannel()

      • createVoiceChannel

        IVoiceChannel createVoiceChannel(IVoiceChannel channel)
        Create a voice channel in this guild.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel built by ChannelBuilder.
        Returns:
        The voice channel created.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Channels permission.
        See Also:
        ChannelBuilder.buildVoiceChannel()

      • deleteGuildChannel

        void deleteGuildChannel(IGuildChannel channel)
        Deletes a guild channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the channel is a text channel, and the text channel is a default channel.
        See Also:
        For more information.

      • createRole

        IRole createRole(IRole role)
        Create a role in this guild.
        Parameters:
        role - The role built by RoleBuilder
        Returns:
        The role created.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.

      • deleteRole

        void deleteRole(IRole role)
        Delete a existed role in this guild.
        Parameters:
        role - The role to be deleted.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If the role is null or if the role is not from this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_ROLE
